pages.text: A ribbon, gifted to pets as an everlasting promise to watch out and care for them.\Name it, add Pigment to it in a Crafting Table and attach it on a creature.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Your pet receive it's new, colored name, will immediately trust you if it does not already and - should it ever die - drop a [#](bb00bb)Broken Promise[#]().
